C3S_434_002.Indicator: Climatic suitability for the tiger mosquito - season length

PopUpElements.Title: The season length of the climatic suitability for the tiger mosquito in <NUTS> under <Scenario>.
PopUpElements.SubTitle:
Values represent a 30-year running average of the EURO-CORDEX ensemble mean and ensemble standard deviation (SD).
Hover over the time series to display the values and the action buttons.

C3S_434_009.Indicator: Projected change in biologically effective degree days

PopUpElements.Title: The projected change in the <anomaly period> biologically effective degree days in <NUTS> under <scenario> for <time period>.
PopUpElements.SubTitle:
Showing the ensemble mean, ensemble maximum and ensemble minimum across 5 CMIP5 climate models.
Hover over the time series to display the values and the action buttons.

ClimatologyElements.Title: Climatology statistics for the monthly mean biologically effective degree days for the period 1981-2010.
ClimatologyElements.SubTitle: Based on ERA5 reanalysis data and showing the mean, standard deviation, and 5th and 95th percentiles of the climatology.
ClimatologyElements.Labels: mean and standard deviation, 5th percentile, 95th percentile
